description: A talk I gave at the NashJS meetup about Generative Art.
title: Intro to generative art with P5.js

description: A collaboration with the music producer Precursor. This work, created with Processing and GauGAN2, won an honorable mention at the Art of Neuroscience 2022 competition.
title: Precursor - Opulent (Music Video)

description: A visualization and audibilization (conversion of data to sound) of different maze generation algorithms.
title: The Sound of Maze Generation on Youtube

description: An exploration of cellular automata with various rules. Number of living neighbours visualized by color. I also wrote and recorded the music for this video.
title: Cellular Automata Playground on Youtube

description: A demo of my "Game of Music" project, a music sequencer based on Conway's Game of Life.
title: A demo of Game of Music on Youtube
